org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication

Class TestReplicationBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.TestReplicationBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestBulkLoadReplication, TestNamespaceReplication, TestRefreshRecoveredReplication, TestReplicationChangingPeerRegionservers, TestReplicationDisableInactivePeer, TestReplicationDroppedTables, TestReplicationEmptyWALRecovery, TestReplicationEndpoint, TestReplicationKillRS, TestReplicationMetricsforUI, TestReplicationSmallTests, TestReplicationStatus, TestReplicationStatusAfterLagging, TestReplicationStatusBothNormalAndRecoveryLagging, TestReplicationStatusSink, TestReplicationStatusSourceStartedTargetStoppedNewOp, TestReplicationStatusSourceStartedTargetStoppedNoOps, TestReplicationStatusSourceStartedTargetStoppedWithRecovery, TestReplicator, TestVerifyReplication, TestVerifyReplicationAdjunct

    public class TestReplicationBase
extends Object
    This class is only a base for other integration-level replication tests. Do not add tests here. TestReplicationSmallTests is where tests that don't require bring machines up/down should go All other tests should have their own classes and extend this one
